name: Law Enforcement Assistance Uniform Crime Reports
objective: To furnish data which will assist heads of law enforcement agencies in administration and operation of their departments. Further, to make information/data available to judges, penologists, sociologists, legislators, media, students, and others interested in crime and its social aspects.
assistance_types: U.S. Territories and possessions (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
applicant_types: Local (includes State-designated Indian Tribes, excludes institutions of higher education and hospitals
State (includes District of Columbia, public institutions of higher education and hospitals)
categories: Law, Justice, and Legal Services - Law Enforcement Support

pons.pon: Improve Investigatory Capacity of Criminal Activity
